originalText.text: An excellent pharmacy with professional and amiable pharmacists who are always ready to answer questions. The staff is courteous and eager to assist.

text.text: An excellent pharmacy with professional and amiable pharmacists who are always ready to answer questions. The staff is courteous and eager to assist.

originalText.text: This pharmacy only cares about themselves and holds no accountability for their irresponsible behavior . A customer tripped on a tote due to the irresponsible behavior of an employee who left a tote in the middle of the Pharmacy and was severely injured  Instead of admitting  to their wrongdoing they decide to counter  sue  the customers caretaker . Ridiculous

originalText.text:
Just calling out some fake reviews:  disgruntled ex-employee fired on the spot for inappropriate behavior towards customers.

This ex-pharmacist has now added fake bad reviews under multiple google accounts for this location in particular and for the other pharmacies under the same management/umbrella.

originalText.text: The pharmacy is very clean with great measures to keep everyone safe during the COVID pandemic. The cashier was nice and very helpful with my request for assistance. They even remember me when I come back. Definitely my go to place when I need something from the pharmacy or a prescription filled.

text.text: The pharmacy is very clean with great measures to keep everyone safe during the COVID pandemic. The cashier was nice and very helpful with my request for assistance. They even remember me when I come back. Definitely my go to place when I need something from the pharmacy or a prescription filled.

originalText.text:
Poor management, very unorganized. My mom came here to pick up her prescription but was told that someone else picked up her prescription and they refused to give her the medicine. STAY AWAY FROM THIS PLACE.

Advise to management - Please take your job more seriously, taking the wrong medication could be harmful to someone else's health and cause other serious conditions. This is more than just a business, your job directly affects other's lives. This is so ridiculous.
